channel.title: Medications Viewers :: Fusion CAC Documentation
channel.description: A Medication Administration Record (MAR, or eMAR for electronic versions), commonly referred to as a drug chart, is the report that serves as a legal record of the drugs administered to a patient at a facility by a health care professional. The MAR is a part of a patientâ€™s permanent record on their medical chart. The health care professional signs off on the record at the time that the drug or device is administered.
